title: LF organised team plat support main
body:
i just wanna join a team with nice people decent players and just a little bit organised when it comes to playing with each other and schedules if there is one for times to play ive played in 3 tournaments i have been in ranked teams for 2-3 years so its easy for me to adapt but as of recent i just got myself free of other groups who really were holding me down so if u would like someone whose on a lot plays a lot and can also is nice guy add me
__
put a comment below if u want to talk and also add me on league as well i will respond asap

replies.body:
great support that can take charge of a team in a time of need with good champion pool and mechanics 


btw after you left we won 4 more games and placed 4th in the tournament :)
